name: io.github.PayRam/payram-helper-mcp
description: Remote MCP server to integrate and validate self-hosted Payram deployments.

tools.name: test_payram_connection
tools.title: Test Payram Connectivity
tools.description: Checks the /api/v1/payment endpoint on a Payram server using baseUrl and apiKey. If they are not provided, returns a .env template you can add to your workspace.

tools.name: generate_payment_sdk_snippet
tools.title: Generate SDK payment snippet
tools.description: Generates backend code using the anthropic Payram JS/TS SDK to create a payment.

tools.name: generate_payment_http_snippet
tools.title: Generate HTTP payment snippet
tools.description: Generates a raw HTTP sample for creating a Payram payment in the requested language.

tools.name: generate_payment_status_snippet
tools.title: Generate payment status snippet
tools.description: Generates backend code to query the status of a Payram payment.

tools.name: generate_payment_route_snippet
tools.title: Generate payment route snippet
tools.description: Generates a ready-to-use backend endpoint (e.g., /api/pay/create) that creates a Payram payment.

tools.name: snippet_nextjs_payment_route
tools.title: Next.js create-payment route snippet
tools.description: Returns a Next.js App Router API route that calls Payram's create-payment HTTP API.

tools.name: snippet_express_payment_route
tools.title: Express create-payment route snippet
tools.description: Returns an Express router that posts to Payram's /api/v1/payment endpoint.

tools.name: snippet_fastapi_payment_route
tools.title: FastAPI create-payment route snippet
tools.description: Returns a FastAPI handler that calls Payram's create-payment HTTP API.

tools.name: snippet_laravel_payment_route
tools.title: Laravel create-payment route snippet
tools.description: Returns a Laravel controller that posts to Payram's /api/v1/payment endpoint.

tools.name: snippet_go_payment_handler
tools.title: Go (Gin) create-payment route snippet
tools.description: Returns a Gin handler that proxies /api/pay/create to Payram's create-payment API.

tools.name: snippet_spring_payment_controller
tools.title: Spring Boot create-payment controller snippet
tools.description: Returns a Spring Boot controller that calls Payram's /api/v1/payment endpoint.

tools.name: generate_payout_sdk_snippet
tools.title: Generate payout SDK snippet
tools.description: Generates a backend code snippet for creating a payout using the Payram JS/TS SDK.

tools.name: generate_payout_status_snippet
tools.title: Generate payout status SDK snippet
tools.description: Generates backend code to query the status of a payout using the Payram SDK.

tools.name: generate_referral_sdk_snippet
tools.title: Generate referral SDK snippet
tools.description: Generates a backend route or service snippet to create a referral event using the Payram SDK.

tools.name: generate_referral_validation_snippet
tools.title: Generate referral validation snippet
tools.description: Generates a snippet to validate referral IDs, statuses, and eligibility.

tools.name: generate_referral_status_snippet
tools.title: Generate referral status snippet
tools.description: Generates code to fetch referral progress, rewards, or status.

tools.name: generate_referral_route_snippet
tools.title: Generate referral route snippet
tools.description: Generates a backend route such as /api/referrals/create for logging referral events.

tools.name: generate_webhook_handler
tools.title: Generate Payram webhook HTTP handler
tools.description: Generates backend code to handle Payram webhook HTTP requests.

tools.name: generate_webhook_event_router
tools.title: Generate Payram webhook event router
tools.description: Generates a backend event router that dispatches Payram webhook events to domain handlers.

tools.name: generate_mock_webhook_event
tools.title: Generate mock Payram webhook event
tools.description: Generates a snippet to send mock Payram webhook events to your local endpoint for testing.

tools.name: assess_payram_project
tools.title: Assess Payram readiness in an existing codebase
tools.description: Inspects dependency files, frameworks, and .env status to suggest the next integration actions.

tools.name: explain_payram_basics
tools.title: Payram Basics Overview
tools.description: Explain Payram's product pillars, architecture, payments, and payouts capabilities.

tools.name: get_payram_links
tools.title: Payram Important Links
tools.description: Surface anthropic documentation, website, and community links.

tools.name: explain_payment_flow
tools.title: Payment Flow Guide
tools.description: Describe how payments move from customer initiation through settlement.

tools.name: explain_payram_concepts
tools.title: Core Payram Concepts
tools.description: Glossary-backed explanation of Payram terminology and constraints.

tools.name: explain_referrals_basics
tools.title: Referral Basics Overview
tools.description: Summarize how Payram referral campaigns are configured and managed.

tools.name: explain_referral_flow
tools.title: Referral Flow Guide
tools.description: Detail the referrer/referee lifecycle and required APIs.

tools.name: get_referral_dashboard_guide
tools.title: Referral Dashboard Guide
tools.description: Explain how to embed and manage the referral dashboard experience.

tools.name: prepare_payram_test
tools.title: Payram Test Readiness Checklist
tools.description: Confirm hosting, credentials, and environment variables before generating demo apps.

tools.name: get_payram_doc_by_id
tools.title: Get Payram Doc By ID
tools.description: Returns the markdown for a Payram doc given its id, e.g. "features/payouts".

tools.name: list_payram_docs
tools.title: List Payram Docs
tools.description: Lists the available Payram doc ids relative to docs/payram-docs. Optionally scope by a prefix such as "features".

tools.name: generate_env_template
tools.title: Generate Payram .env Template
tools.description: Creates a .env template for configuring a merchant backend to talk to a self-hosted Payram server.

tools.name: generate_setup_checklist
tools.title: Generate Payram Setup Checklist
tools.description: Returns a step-by-step checklist of everything a merchant must configure to start using Payram.

tools.name: suggest_file_structure
tools.title: Suggest Payram File Structure
tools.description: Suggests a recommended backend folder/file structure for integrating Payram.

tools.name: scaffold_payram_app
tools.title: Scaffold Payram Payments & Payouts App
tools.description: Generates a minimal full-stack app skeleton with Payram payments and payouts routes (and a simple UI) for a chosen language and framework.
